Method Detail

updateWar

public static void updateWar(java.lang.String templateWar,
                             java.lang.String war,
                             java.util.List<java.lang.String> newWarNames,
                             java.lang.String repoUri,
                             java.lang.String branch,
                             java.lang.String configRepoUri,
                             java.lang.String configBranch,
                             java.lang.String domain,
                             java.lang.String context,
                             boolean secure)
                      throws java.lang.Exception

This method updates a template war with the following settings.

Parameters:
templateWar - The name of the template war to pull from the classpath.
war - The path of an external war to update (optional).
newWarNames - The name to give the new war. (note: only the first element of this list is used.)
repoUri - The uri to a github repo to pull content from.
branch - The branch of the github repo to pull content from.
configRepoUri - The uri to a github repo to pull config from.
configBranch - The branch of the github repo to pull config from.
domain - The domain to bind a vHost to.
context - The context root that this war will deploy to.
secure - A flag to set if this war needs to have its contents password protected.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

addRelativeTo

public static void addRelativeTo(org.w3c.dom.Element parent,
                                 org.w3c.dom.Element child,
                                 java.lang.String tagname,
                                 boolean first)

Adds a child xml element to a parent element relative to other elements with a tagname.

If first is true then the child is added before any elements with a tagname, the opposite happens when first is false.

Parameters:
parent - The parent xml element.
child - The child xml element to add.
tagname - The tagname to be relative to.
first - A flag that describes the relative relationship between the child element and its siblings named by tagname.

addListener

public static void addListener(org.w3c.dom.Document doc,
                               org.w3c.dom.Element root)
Adds a shiro environment listener to load the shiro config file.

Parameters:
doc - The xml DOM document to create the new xml elements with.
root - The xml Element node to add the listener to.

addContextParam

public static void addContextParam(org.w3c.dom.Document doc,
                                   org.w3c.dom.Element root)
Adds a context parameter to a web.xml file to override where the shiro config location is to be loaded from. The location loaded from will be represented by the "com.meltmedia.cadmium.contentRoot" system property.

Parameters:
doc - The xml DOM document to create the new xml elements with.
root - The xml Element node to add the context param to.

addFilter

public static void addFilter(org.w3c.dom.Document doc,
                             org.w3c.dom.Element root)
Adds the shiro filter to a web.xml file.

Parameters:
doc - The xml DOM document to create the new xml elements with.
root - The xml Element node to add the filter to.

addFilterMapping

public static void addFilterMapping(org.w3c.dom.Document doc,
                                    org.w3c.dom.Element root)
Adds the filter mapping for the shiro filter to a web.xml file.

Parameters:
doc - The xml DOM document to create the new xml elements with.
root - The xml Element node to add the filter mapping to.

addDispatchers

public static void addDispatchers(org.w3c.dom.Document doc,
                                  org.w3c.dom.Element filterMapping,
                                  java.lang.String... names)
Adds dispatchers for each item in the vargs parameter names to a filter mapping element of a web.xml file.

Parameters:
doc - The xml DOM document to create the new xml elements with.
filterMapping - The filter mapping element to append to from a web.xml document.
names - The names of the dispatchers to add.

updateDomain

public static void updateDomain(java.util.zip.ZipFile inZip,
                                java.util.zip.ZipOutputStream outZip,
                                java.util.zip.ZipEntry jbossWeb,
                                java.lang.String domain,
                                java.lang.String context)
                         throws java.lang.Exception
Adds vHost and context-root mappings to a jboss-web.xml file contained withing a zip/war file.

Parameters:
inZip - The zip file that the original jboss-web.xml file is in.
outZip - The zip output stream to write the updated jboss-web.xml file to.
jbossWeb - The zip element that represents the jboss-web.xml file.
domain - The domain to add a vHost for.
context - The context to add a context-root for.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

storeXmlDocument

public static void storeXmlDocument(java.util.zip.ZipOutputStream outZip,
                                    java.util.zip.ZipEntry jbossWeb,
                                    org.w3c.dom.Document doc)
                             throws java.io.IOException,
                                    javax.xml.transform.TransformerFactoryConfigurationError,
                                    javax.xml.transform.TransformerConfigurationException,
                                    javax.xml.transform.TransformerException
Writes a xml document to a zip file with an entry specified by the jbossWeb parameter.

Parameters:
outZip - The zip output stream to write to.
jbossWeb - The zip entry to add to the zip file.
doc - The xml DOM document to write to the zip file.
Throws:
java.io.IOException
javax.xml.transform.TransformerFactoryConfigurationError
javax.xml.transform.TransformerConfigurationException
javax.xml.transform.TransformerException

removeNodesByTagName

public static void removeNodesByTagName(org.w3c.dom.Element doc,
                                        java.lang.String tagname)
Removes elements by a specified tag name from the xml Element passed in.

Parameters:
doc - The xml Element to remove from.
tagname - The tag name to remove.

storeProperties

public static void storeProperties(java.util.zip.ZipOutputStream outZip,
                                   java.util.zip.ZipEntry cadmiumPropertiesEntry,
                                   java.util.Properties cadmiumProps,
                                   java.util.List<java.lang.String> newWarNames)
                            throws java.io.IOException
Adds a properties file to a war.

Parameters:
outZip - The zip output stream to add to.
cadmiumPropertiesEntry - The entry to add.
cadmiumProps - The properties to store in the zip file.
newWarNames - The first element of this list is used in a comment of the properties file.
Throws:
java.io.IOException

updateProperties

public static java.util.Properties updateProperties(java.util.zip.ZipFile inZip,
                                                    java.util.zip.ZipEntry cadmiumPropertiesEntry,
                                                    java.lang.String repoUri,
                                                    java.lang.String branch,
                                                    java.lang.String configRepoUri,
                                                    java.lang.String configBranch)
                                             throws java.io.IOException

Loads a properties file from a zip file and updates 2 properties in that properties file.

The properties file in the zip is not written back to the zip file with the updates.

Parameters:
inZip - The zip file to load the properties file from.
cadmiumPropertiesEntry - The entry of a properties file in the zip to load.
repoUri - The value to set the "com.meltmedia.cadmium.git.uri" property with.
branch - The value to set the "com.meltmedia.cadmium.branch" property with.
configRepoUri - The value to set the "com.meltmedia.cadmium.config.git.uri" property with.
configBranch - The value to set the "com.meltmedia.cadmium.config.branch" property with.
Returns:
The updated properties object that was loaded from the zip file.
Throws:
java.io.IOException
